short_summary: Education Coordinator - Stream to Sea Program Delivery and Coordination Service
description: The department need contractors to provide delivery and coordination services for the Stream to Sea Program.
full_summary:
**Title:** Education Coordinator - Stream to Sea Program Delivery and Coordination Services - Campbell River Area
**Tender Reference:** PW-22-01009641
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 30003164
**Publication Date:** 2022-10-10
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-25T14:00:00
**Location:** Campbell River, British Columbia, Canada

**Objectives:**

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking service providers to deliver and coordinate the Stream to Sea Program in the Campbell River area. This program aims to encourage students from Kindergarten to Grade 12, as well as First Nations, local communities, and external parties to participate in cooperative fisheries and watershed stewardship activities.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful contractor will provide delivery and coordination services for the Stream to Sea Program, as defined by the Community Advisor, for the following areas:

* Comox Valley (SD 71)
* Campbell River (SD 72)
* Francophone Campbell River (SD 93)

**Resources and Requirements:**

* A suitable vehicle for transporting equipment
* Personal field gear
* Cell phone for communication with teachers and DFO staff
* The contractor is expected to provide technical support, equipment, and supplies for the DFO classroom incubation program
* The contractor will also participate in in-service sessions for teacher groups, provide professional presentations, and coordinate storm drain marking program activities with youth groups

**Period of Contract:**

The contract period will be from December 1, 2022, to July 31, 2023, with two option periods of one year each.

**Security and Trade Agreements:**

There are no security requirements or trade agreements associated with this tender.

**Contact Information:**

For more information or to submit a proposal, please contact:

Clara Ventura
DFO
 Phone: 613-203-4981
Email: [clara.ventura@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:clara.ventura@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
